data.title: Outline6: Some people say that “it is never too late to learn”. Do you agree or disagree

content_category.describe_first: iit helps us widen our knowledge, we can learn about many things such as cultures, traditions, history and so on. It will be very useful in the future
content_category.describe_second: it helps us improve many useful skill such as life skills, teamwork skills, soft skills and so on. It is very wonderful and interesting

content_category.describe_first: it will affect our health, it makes me tired and bored, so we can study and work badly
content_category.describe_second: it makes us take a lot of time to relax, reduce stressed, and improve emotion, we will not refresh our mind, so we will not work effectively. It is not good for everyone.
